channel.title: Mod tools help PDF: Where is it?
channel.description: I saw Chon link to a PDF about uploading to workshop, and it got lost in the flurry of posting. Since I want to publish something now, could someone link me to it? It's nearing the end of school, and I don't have time to look through pages of posts.

item.title: Mod tools help PDF: Where is it?
item.dc:creator: Bulik
item.source: Mod tools help PDF: Where is it?

item.title: Mod tools help PDF: Where is it?
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
Sure. Here it is: https://www.blackmesagame.com/bms_workshop_guide.pdf

Read full topic
